while(T){
    xy = sample(-9:9,6)
    x = sort(xy[1:3])
    y = xy[4:6]
    
    xx1 = seq(x[1],x[2],1)
    xx2 = seq(x[2],x[3],1)
    yy1 = (y[2]-y[1])/(x[2]-x[1])*(xx1-x[1])+y[1]
    yy2 = (y[3]-y[2])/(x[3]-x[2])*(xx2-x[2])+y[2]
    xx = c(xx1,xx2)
    yy = c(yy1,yy2)
    
    if(abs(sum(sign(y)))==1 && (sign(y[2])==sign(y[1]) || sign(y[2])==sign(y[3])) && sum(yy==0)==1 && (y[2]==max(y) || y[2]==min(y)) && x[3]-x[1]>4){break}
}

if(y[2]==max(y)){
    mami = "maximum"
    lp = "("
    rp = "]"
    incl = x[1]
    incr = x[2]
    decl = x[2]
    decr = x[3]
    col1 = "orange"
    col1t = rgb(0.4,0.2,0)
    tex1 = "increasing"
    col2 = rgb(0,0.6,1)
    col2t = rgb(0,0.1,0.5)
    tex2 = "decreasing"
    yy1 = 9.5
    yy2 = -9.5
}
if(y[2]==min(y)){
    mami = "minimum"
    lp = "["
    rp = ")"
    incl = x[2]
    incr = x[3]
    decl = x[1]
    decr = x[2]
    col2 = "orange"
    col2t = rgb(0.4,0.2,0)
    tex2 = "increasing"
    col1 = rgb(0,0.6,1)
    col1t = rgb(0,0.1,0.5)
    tex1 = "decreasing"
    yy1 = -9.5
    yy2 = 9.5
}

posl = min(xx[yy>=0])
posr = max(xx[yy>=0])
negl = min(xx[yy<=0])
negr = max(xx[yy<=0])

doml = x[1]
domr = x[3]
ranl = min(y)
ranr = max(y)

relx = x[2]
rely = y[2]

ach = -9:9
al = paste0("* ",ach,collapse="\n")

sols = c(posl,posr,
         negl,negr,
         incl,incr,
         decl,decr,
         doml,domr,
         ranl,ranr,
         relx,rely)

fal = paste0(rep(al,length(sols)),collapse="\n")

sol = character()
for(ss in sols){
    sol = c(sol,paste0(1*(ach==ss),collapse=""))
}

fsol = paste0(sol,collapse="|")

Answerlist

`r fal`


Solution
========

1. Interval where $f$ is positive = (`r posl`, `r posr`)
2. Interval where $f$ is negative = (`r negl`, `r negr`)
3. Interval where $f$ is increasing = (`r incl`, `r incr`)
4. Interval where $f$ is decreasing = (`r decl`, `r decr`)
5. Domain = (`r doml`, `r domr`)
6. Range = `r lp``r ranl`, `r ranr``r rp`
7. Point of relative `r mami` = (`r relx`, `r rely`)
